website_summaries.verdict: This medium-sized board showcases a beautiful and unique pre-printed design.
pros: White board surrounding cork offers simple and elegant look
Flowered pattern design great for any feminine space or styling
Many customers appreciate the sizing of the board
cons: Color of print may appear different in person than online

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not what I was expecting at all. The cork isn't thick enough so if you use a regular push pin it pokes out the back. Came slightly damaged and the print was smeared. Not very happy but don't want to deal with the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute-but not as a cork board
customer_reviews.text: This cork board is cute, but cute only goes so far especially when a cork board. I didn't purchase this cork board to act as a piece of art. I bought this cork board to actually hang thing on it by my desk. Push pins can't be pushed into the cork! You can barley get the tip of the push pin in, so you can't hold anything more than one piece of paper. The push pins fall out since they can only be pushed in a smidge. If your buying this for art-great, if not find a cheap cork board that allows pins to be pushed into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Cork is far to thin. Only good for decor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little home office with the intention of using it as a cork board. Though really cute, it isn't useful for anything other than decor. As shown in the pictures, the cork is so thin that regular tacks don't go in far. I could fit my index finger between the space. And the pin it comes with makes large holes in the cork. And with the cork being so thin it peels off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Downs

customer_reviews.title: Cute alternative!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Really cute alternative to the plain ones. I have it on a wall in my kitchen to help keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Ware

customer_reviews.title: So cute but beware about pins - not all 4 included
customer_reviews.text: The board came really quick. It was easy to put up, came with screws and anchors. Don't need to use the anchors, can use nails if prefer. Wish there were more pins included for the price, only came with 2, but says 4... So that's why I gave it a 3. Seems like that has been the complaint for a over a year, but the description hasn't changed. Amazon needs to update it.
customer_reviews.author: Dasha Butters

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: This looks so nice on my wall! I love the design so that when I don't have a lot posted on it, it becomes "wall art"! I don't care for the over-sized push pins that come with it. They are loose and wobbly and feel like they are going to fall off the board. I have them stuck in the corners for decoration. Instead I purchased Clipco Push Pins Jar (200-Count) (White) and they look very nice with it.
customer_reviews.author: Imamomof4

customer_reviews.title: Can Only be Hung Horizontally
customer_reviews.text: I love this cork board. With the pattern, it's so much more interesting to look at than a boring, regular one. The frame is sturdy. It has only one way to be hung on the wall, though, as the metal hangers are only on one side of the board. It can only be hung horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I glued wine corks to this and now it works fine. But the cork needs to be thicker
customer_reviews.text: This is okay for looks but it is NOT thick enough to put a pin in. IT comes with two pins that work, but regular thumbtacks are hard to get in. Push pins are just okay also. I glued wine corks to this and now it works fine. But the cork needs to be thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Sabin

customer_reviews.title: Hanging hardware issues
customer_reviews.text: The printed design is just what I was hoping for but I was surprised to find that the hanging hardware on the back only allows for landscape/lengthwise hanging. We have a narrow spot and had to rig together a way to hang this in the up & down/portrait orientation we needed. What should have been a ten minute job took over an hour, so that was obnoxious. Now that it's done it looks nice but the printed design was perhaps not worth the hassle. Next time I'll buy a plain one and stamp a design on with some white craft paint.
customer_reviews.author: akme

customer_reviews.title: Not much cork thickness
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, it’s a lot more board than cork though. Difficult to push the pins into it. Not something you want to use when you will need to take things off and put things on frequently. I’m pretty sure it will disintegrate because of how little cork there is.
customer_reviews.author: Not Assigned

customer_reviews.title: Too thin to be functional
customer_reviews.text: This is attractive but not practical as an actual cork board. It’s really hard to push thumbtacks in and I suspect it’s because the cork is so thin I’m actually pushing out the back of the board. I will be replacing it with something more functional.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea of painted board
customer_reviews.text: Liked the idea of painted board. I bought it to use for my kids schedule and homework log charts. Unfortunately very disappointed from the holes created by the tacks. It seems to be difficult to use tacks or push up pins on this board and end up in larger holes with falling surrounding as in the picture !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherif

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Didn't come w/ 4 pins, only 2 and they don't work well. The white frame was somehow dirty, even though the board was shrink wrapped. Overall a bit cheap and I wouldn't say it was worth $20. I tried some push pins I had and bc this board is so thin the pins barely go in so not sure how well this will really work. Depending on your placement and use, might be worth it to spend a little more and get a better quality board.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Such a Pretty Corkboard
customer_reviews.text: This corkboard adds a whimsical touch to my office wall. I’m very pleased with it, and I appreciate that it comes with a couple of very pretty pushpins to go along with it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L.

customer_reviews.title: Cork thin
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this again. Is attractive, nice size, BUT the cork is so thin you cannot get the push pins in very far. Unlike others I have, which have the correct thickness so papers are secure. Not on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, the print on the cork is nice and clear and gives a nice touch of whimsy. I am using this as a necklace holder for my costume jewelry and it's working really good and looks pretty on the wall. I didn't use the pins included so it was fine that the one was actually broke and couldn't be used even if I had wanted to. I purchased bright colorful larger pins and they look great against the tan and white of the board.
customer_reviews.author: KR....

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this board because read a motivational book and decided to create a Vision Board. I love how it looks- not plain yet it's not too much. Pretty and useful :)
customer_reviews.author: Nigina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is stunning in person! Works like a standard cork board I don’t understand the other reviews stating it doesn’t take a whole tack bc it does mine? I’d buy more for my office and very well Might
customer_reviews.author: JILLIAN L.

customer_reviews.title: Really and attractive twist in the cork board. Use ...
customer_reviews.text: Really and attractive twist in the cork board. Use it for hanging kids crafts, etc. Stylish and a lot nicer to look at in the kitchen/pantry and the plain units you usually see. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the looks and sturdiness!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board for my bedroom. It’s so cute! It’s very sturdy and a good thickness! I haven’t put it up yet because I just got it but it looks very simple and I’m not worried!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Nieuwsma

customer_reviews.title: Really cute but flawed frame
customer_reviews.text: This bulletin board is wonderful and I actually had people coming from all over the office I just started working in to look at it because they'd heard about it from someone else. It's not too flashy but it's really pretty. I'm only giving 3 stars because the frame is detached at one of the corners and glued or stuck that way and it's really noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Two damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, both arrived damaged. Super cute product so I was bummed. Can’t be that sturdy if they’re broken upon arrival. :(
customer_reviews.author: Laura Olson

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I got this cork borad in Sep. And im a little upset because i didnt get to putting up yet. It is now Oct and this borad was just sitting in my room on the floor against the wall untouched. And i exaime it a few weeks ago to find it was missing a few pieces. they were just sitting right in front of it. as if it just Disenagrated. im upset. its was cute. i was looking forward to putting up.
customer_reviews.author: Martrese

customer_reviews.title: So pretty, but thin cork layer
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pattern, looks good on my wall... but very thin cork so pins do not go in very far and feels a little cheap. Don’t need very long pins with this, but does the trick and looks cuter than a regular cork would.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wade

customer_reviews.title: Attractive design
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and looks nice on the wall. I used regulat tacs to secure things like bills and paperwork. Keeps us organized!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and worked well with my crafting idea thank you
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Worth what you pay
customer_reviews.text: I adored the pattern. On the thin side but I ordered for my girls room to hang their pictures and drawings. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my all white office
customer_reviews.text: I needed something functional but cute. Going for a mostly all white office and this was the perfect addition. Great product, high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have listened to some of the bad reviews, but at times I have found items others didn't like and I have. Unfortunately this time was not the case. Although this cork board looks great on my wall, the push pins barely even go in the board and hardly hold a piece of paper. I am now trying to find a DIY to see if I can salvage this or just repurpose because it is not serving as a message board for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey C.

customer_reviews.title: brightens up the office
customer_reviews.text: this board is a very nice size for an office space. The print came well intact. Basic push pins work very well, and the cork is thick enough that I have had no issues. It was easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: brea

customer_reviews.title: Just good!
customer_reviews.text: Great board! Live the design, I was tired of the old boring brown boards. It’s very strong and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: AShpo

customer_reviews.title: Needed something to put in my daughter's room for awards ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to put in my daughter's room for awards and pictures. We had a hard time finding a bulletin board that looks stylish at the same time. This bulletin board fit the requirements.
customer_reviews.author: RKerins

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Perfectly Functional
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a vision board of sorts and not only does it hold it's contents, but it does so with drama, style, and flair. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Empathy

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my craft room. Perfect size. The painted cork is adorable! Wish they had more pins than 2 because they are so cute too!
customer_reviews.author: nolabee

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Mandala cork board goes with yellow, white, grey decor of child's bedroom for special pictures and reminders
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of this cork board
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this cork board, however it can be so hard to push the pushpins in sometimes that I've broken a few, (the decorative ones that come with it) I guess when it gets used more it will "soften up?" other than that it suits my needs..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! I love this. I dislike the look of a plain cork board but wanted one to help me stay organized. This being super cute was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant to eye
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant to look at, even when empty Holds sufficient memos and puctures Fits in with room appearance
customer_reviews.author: JEANNE PERROTTI

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks just as pictured. Hung on the wall with a command strip. Holds papers fine, has lots of push pins.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Not your average cork board
customer_reviews.text: Very cute corkboard! I personalized my daughter's with her name cut from vinyl on my cricket and it looks adorable
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cade

customer_reviews.title: Absolutley lovely
customer_reviews.text: The pop of white just makes it a joy to see goals put upon. Its creative and fun for a creative space. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Easy to install. Holds papers I wanted with sons school info. Works good
customer_reviews.author: S.J.I.

customer_reviews.title: Printed Cork Board
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. This cork board is very decorative and sturdy. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Great pin board!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, looks great on my daughter’s wall for pictures, tickets and momentous.
customer_reviews.author: Jlynne

customer_reviews.title: Requires a hammer to get a tack into board
customer_reviews.text: It may be a board, and it may be cork, but it requires a hammer to get a tack into board.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this cork board. She has some pics and notes on it in her room. Be sure to get the stick pins to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie J

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The paint decos on them is so cute! Ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Jeego

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great value- perfect for posting kids bring home projects and papers!
customer_reviews.author: awesomesauceflips

customer_reviews.title: Good look, not sure about function
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this for my office. I feel like the push pins are sometimes hard to push in, even the two that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsTesterOfAllTheThings

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and cute
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived in good shape. No dings, dents, or bad manufacturing here. I'm happy with it. It's heavy and seems sturdy too, and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Marks

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to be much larger. I should have looked at the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: M. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very thin cork board. Most pins (that I’ve experienced) don’t push all the way in because it’s so shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Manssuer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but cork is thin
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking easy to hang . The push pins are difficult to push into the board . It may be because the cork itself is quite thin .
customer_reviews.author: Grammashe

customer_reviews.title: I love this board
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. It looks super cute on my craft room wall. It is lightweight and was easy to mount. I love the white painted floral pattern. It gives my room that special unique look.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wharton

customer_reviews.title: cork board is cute
customer_reviews.text: The cork board is cute, but very hard. I had trouble putting the push pins into the cork board.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice but shallow
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a place to display my kid's artwork without having it all over the house. It looks nice up on the wall and was easy enough to hang. However, the cork itself is a little on the shallow side. The 2 push pins it comes with work well for it, but regular push pins hit the back of the board and stick out a bit. I still think it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: As described so I am happy. I do wonder why it shows a picture ...
customer_reviews.text: As described so I am happy. I do wonder why it shows a picture with 4 flower pins but says it only comes with 2... Deceptive! I thought I was missing 2 until I read the description...
customer_reviews.author: Nship

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for organizing college stuff. Very sturdy! Leaves quite large holes in your wall if you choose to hang with provided equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: good quality. Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute addition to my office. Thick cork, good quality. Excellent, secure hanging mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: BMDavis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a corkboard that had some pizazz and this one was perfect! Well made, very attractive and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: terria

customer_reviews.title: Good design, bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good. But: the cork is very hard to get pins in. I got only two and already broken pins included.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Cork Board
customer_reviews.text: We order the cork board when it arrived, we were exited to see how well constructed it was. The board came with all the hardware that's needed to be mounted. Overall, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: A cute cork board
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little cork board. I am renting, so instead of drilling holes into the walls I hung up with command strips and it seems to be staying in place. I love the pattern, but I will say that I wish the cork was a little thicker. My push-pins don't go in very far.
customer_reviews.author: katieb

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I had to sit it outside to air out. It had a very strong chemical smell. Not sure I want to put it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These look great in my office
customer_reviews.text: These look great in my office! The cork itself is slightly thin, but so far everything I've put up has stayed put. These add some fun to my space!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Cork isn’t thick enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty but the cork isn’t very thick so it’s hard to get push pins in it. Which isn’t that kind of the point?
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, kinda smelled
customer_reviews.text: Other than it having a weird, musty smell to it I love it! I just sprayed it with an essential oil mix but it’s pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the wall
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to put in our kitchen. I wanted all the papers and misc stuff off of the fridge and this did the trick. It looks so nice so even if it is bare it isn't an eye sore. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted but the thumbtack that came with it had a piece of paper floating in the glass area. I'm still happy with the item and its what I needed but I couldn't give it a 5 star for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with all tacks
customer_reviews.text: You can’t use regular tacks with this cork board. You have to get special ones
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great prime day deal
customer_reviews.text: Great prime day purchase. My daughter was thrilled to receive this board and hang it in her room. It's the perfect size, not too obnoxiously large and not to small to be useful. She is a happy teen!
customer_reviews.author: Kiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Love this board, very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I can attach anything like notes and pictures on this board. It is just the right size to place on a wall in my room, and looks very good. Perfect size to attach everything on there.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Push pins are short but overall good board
customer_reviews.text: Board came quick and is very nice. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars was the push pins it came with are short and don't penetrate board that well. Better off using tacks from Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I use it in a bedroom office and it looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi D Schuchardt

customer_reviews.title: Nice cork board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for my twin daughters. Great product. Size is perfect fir their rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this cork board, it looks amazing in my office. It’s a great size, I only wish it came with more of the cute pins.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Nice - but a bit thin
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit thin- the push pins barely “go in”. But it’s cute
customer_reviews.author: Woodland_Mom

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I love the color & pattern. The frame does not match up that great at the corners. The other issue is the cork is not that deep so depending what type of push pins you have they may go all the way through the back of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and looks great on the wall. Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ds94ta

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as pictured. I love it because the white flowers give it a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Cihr

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and great material
customer_reviews.text: So stylish and great material! Love the pattern and size as well as the overall look of it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cute but it’s super hard to push the pins in. It also came with only one push pin instead of two. Definitely don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Only one direction it can be hung
customer_reviews.text: Can only be hung horizontally so wouldn't fit where I wanted it. My husband drilled holes so I could hang it vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G. Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable... Buy more pins
customer_reviews.text: Adorable cork board! As stated In previous reviews... Would be nice to have some more cute push pins, but it is really cute! There was a small blob of paint on corner of mine, like it was still wet when it was packaged, but doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Meglei

customer_reviews.title: Good appearance not just plain
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice appearance while being good for posting things
customer_reviews.author: Peter Oberton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect used in dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Love, so much better than just a boring cork board perfect size
customer_reviews.author: savage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool cork board. Looks great in my office. Quality is good. I receive many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: but ti is really pretty. The thumb tacks it comes with are super ...
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as big as I expected, but ti is really pretty. The thumb tacks it comes with are super cheap though.
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Came in with no issues. Use it as my vision board. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works with Command Strip Hooks
customer_reviews.text: Great! We were able to hang with command strip hooks for my daughter’s dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: Hoover, AL

customer_reviews.title: Love this bulletin board
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for college or an office space! I love it. The print is very good too!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice product good price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. We used ours in the kitchen to pay family snapshots and kids artwork. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design, easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: I love this board, it looks high end and the background design adds a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: fallon

customer_reviews.title: Jazzed up bulletin board- love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bulletin board is awesome! It brought just the “pop of pizazz” I wanted for my home office. The value for this style can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and the perfect board to add some splash to an office wall.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best quality corkboard that I’ve ever used and the design as a fun twist.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: The product was poorly made. The top of the frame came off immediately when I picked it up. When I put it back on and attempted to hang it on the wall, the metal piece in the back ripped off and now the entire board cannot be hung up. For this price, not high enough quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Both Functional and Decorative
customer_reviews.text: Awesome board. Great Design. Looks great on the wall in my office, both functional and decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible off-gassing
customer_reviews.text: The off-gassing from this board was so strong and so persistent I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my kitchen and now I have a place ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my kitchen and now I have a place for my kids drawings and cards I get in the mail. I didn't use the wall attachments as they seemed extreme, I just used some leftover picture hooks I had and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

product_meta.title: Catalina Printed Cork Board
product_meta.description:
Taking the classic cork board to elegant heights with posh geometric floral print and a chic white frame. Decorate your wall space with this sassy cork board for an inspiring hub to hang photos and keepsakes with the darling push pins included. WallPops printed cork boards are 23.5-in x 17-in x 1-in and come with two coordinating pins.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Taking the classic cork board to elegant heights with posh geometric floral print and a chic white frame. Decorate your wall space with this sassy cork board for an inspiring hub to hang photos and keepsakes with the darling push pins included.
feature_bullets: Easy to install - hang from hooks or pins

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars515 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
